question:
Consider the following statements about Prime Ministerâ€™s Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP):
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
  2. The programme focuses on skill development of farmers to boost their entrepreneurial capacity
  3. Any individual above 18 years of age is eligible to join the programme
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The programme is being implemented by Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME). <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The programme aims at generating self-employment opportunities through establishment of micro-enterprises in the non-farm sector by helping traditional artisans and unemployed youth. It is a credit-linked subsidy programme. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. Any individual above 18 years of age is eligible. Under the programme, General category beneficiaries can avail of margin money subsidy of 25% of the project cost in rural areas and 15% in urban areas. Those belonging to special categories such as Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe/OBC /Minorities/Women, Ex-serviceman, Physically Handicapped, NER, Hill and Border areas etc. the margin money subsidy is 35% in rural areas and 25% in urban areas.
